title: New: Marie Naffah- David Gray
body:
I’ve just about got _Primrose Hill_ out of my head when **Marie Naffah** comes out with another toe-tapping tune, _David Gray_.

She wrote this unconventional love song after she was at an eponymous gig in London. It looks at the way “certain songs will forever remind you of a particular person and make you so happy that you feel like you could burst”. There’s nothing soppy about this track, it’s full of summer and life, so grab your shoes and join her in dancing at the _hardware store.._ or in the park with some beers.
